answer:
I don't, but I don't currently feel the need to. Actually I don't want a lot of feedback after I've built an app and launched. I would prefer feedback on the idea phase. For a long time I've thought about building an app for sharing and getting feedback on ideas as that didn't exist anywhere. I gave up because I never got feedback on that idea.

The big problem with feedback in my experience is that it almost never comes from a person in a position to give good feedback. Maybe I'm missing something.
